values.name: EFFECTIVE HEIGHT OF HEAD RESTRAINT IN HIGHEST POSITION
values.description: MEASURE THE HEAD RESTRAINT HEIGHT FROM R-POINT TO THE EFFECTIVE TOP OF THE HEAD RESTRAINT ALONG THE TORSO LINE IN THE HIGHEST AND LOWEST POSITION OF HEAD RESTRAINT

values.name: EFFECTIVE HEIGHT OF HEAD RESTRAINT IN LOWEST POSITION
values.description: MEASURE THE HEAD RESTRAINT HEIGHT FROM R-POINT TO THE EFFECTIVE TOP OF THE HEAD RESTRAINT ALONG THE TORSO LINE IN THE HIGHEST AND LOWEST POSITION OF HEAD RESTRAINT

values.name: HEIGHT OF HEAD RESTRAINT IN HIGHEST POSITION
values.description: MEASURE THE HEAD RESTRAINT HEIGHT FROM R-POINT TO THE TOP OF HEAD RESTRAINT ALONG THE TORSO LINE IN THE HIGHEST AND LOWEST POSITION OF HEAD RESTRAINT

values.name: HEIGHT OF HEAD RESTRAINT IN LOWEST POSITION
values.description: MEASURE THE HEAD RESTRAINT HEIGHT FROM R-POINT TO THE TOP OF HEAD RESTRAINT ALONG THE TORSO LINE IN THE HIGHEST AND LOWEST POSITION OF HEAD RESTRAINT

values.name: CLEARANCE OF HEAD RESTRAINT TO VEHICLE INTERIOR
values.description: ALTERNATIVELY, MEASURE THE MINIMUM DISTANCE BETWEEN HEAD RESTRAINT IN THE HIGHEST POSITION TO VEHICLE INTERIOR OR ROOFLINE
